::Shredder::

Shredder listens to Cybershark on his comm-link, remembering that Magmatron 
had wanted him dead.

"Hey," he says into his comm, sending the message to the enemy Destrons, "Why 
don't we team up for now, and take this guy out? We could talk more later."
